thread.title: One Night Stay At the Haymarket Hotel
thread.title_full: One Night Stay At the Haymarket Hotel - Review of Haymarket Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mags w
title: One Night Stay At the Haymarket Hotel
text:
Stayed one night in a deluxe Room, the room was absolutely immaculate, beautifully detailed with a very homely feel and spacious.
The bathroom was also very nice with TVs to watch whilst you are in the bath. Nice toiletries, with a very pleasant aroma, very natural not over powering like some.
We spent the evening at the Phantom of the Opera Show and in the hotel bar 'Brumus Bar' enjoying cocktails and bar snacks. I can highly recommend the Raspberry Cheese Cake cocktail and the Haymarker Cosmo.
All the bar staff very pleasant and attentive.
We enjoyed a beautifully cooked breakfast in our room.
Highly recommend, a very high class establishment with out the pretentiousness of some of London's other highly rated hotels. You just feel at home here.
Room Tip: Room 5 is beautiful See more room tips
